Core Application & Web Stacks -> Web Dev.rationale: This choice is for creating a digital platform to sell cakes online.
Core Application & Web Stacks -> Web Dev.purpose: Enables the creation of a backend system for an online bakery shop.

Web Development -> Backend.rationale: This choice is necessary to handle operations like inventory management, order processing, and user authentication.
Web Development -> Backend.purpose: Enables the backend functionality required for an online bakery shop.

Backend -> REST.rationale: REST is widely supported and well-documented, making it an ideal choice for a simple backend application that needs to handle requests from multiple clients.
Backend -> REST.purpose: Enables the creation of resources, read, update, delete operations, and management of online bakery shop's cakes inventory.

REST -> JavaScript/TypeScript.rationale: JavaScript/TypeScript is widely used for web development and has a rich ecosystem of libraries for building backends, such as Node.js.
REST -> JavaScript/TypeScript.purpose: Enables rapid development of scalable, efficient and maintainable backend services.

JavaScript/TypeScript -> Express.js.rationale: Popular and widely-adopted Node.js framework for building web applications, especially backends.
JavaScript/TypeScript -> Express.js.purpose: Enables efficient creation of the online bakery shop backend

Express.js -> NGINX.rationale: Widely adopted by web applications, known for high performance and low resource consumption.
Express.js -> NGINX.purpose: Enables serving of multiple concurrent requests efficiently.
